abstract: LinkedIn, the networking site, gets a little bit overeager in its quest for developers, annoying some at Google.

lead_paragraph: See update at the bottom; LinkedIn says it made a mistake.

headline.main: In Hunt for Programmers, Desperation Sets In

abstract: For Silicon Valley investors, there’s new hot spot on Asian horizon: Vietnam. The San Jose Mercury News reports that a tech gathering in the Valley to discuss Asia’s new roaring tiger drew drew an array of participants, from Google representatives to Ho Chi Minh City start-up executives.
lead_paragraph: For Silicon Valley investors, there’s new hot spot on Asian horizon: Vietnam. The San Jose Mercury News reports that a tech gathering in the Valley to discuss Asia’s new roaring tiger drew drew an array of participants, from Google representatives to Ho Chi Minh City start-up executives.

headline.main: Next Stop for Silicon Valley: Vietnam
